dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1225 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Calvert (for himself and Mrs. Torres of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California.

section.header: Single, unique ZIP code for Eastvale, California
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this section, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing solely Eastvale, California.
